transforms.code:
try:
		Name = '_reporte_oee_maq_perdidas'
		obj = system.mes.analysis.getMESAnalysisSettings(Name)
		end = self.view.params.endDate #system.date.parse(self.view.params.endDate, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
		start = self.view.params.startDate #system.date.parse(self.view.params.startDate, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
		params = {'eqPath' : self.view.params.eqPath}
		result = system.mes.analysis.executeAnalysis(start, end, obj, params)
		data = result.getDataset()
	# Calcular total (100%):
		#pyData = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(data)
		totalDt = 0.0
		for j in range(data.rowCount):
			totalDt += data.getValueAt(j,"Line State Duration")
	
		acc = 0		
		list = []
		for i in range(data.rowCount):
			acc += 1.0 * data.getValueAt(i,"Line State Duration") / totalDt
			list.append( {'reason': data.getValueAt(i,"Line Downtime Reason"), 'downtime': data.getValueAt(i,"Line State Duration"), 'percent': acc } )
		return list
	except:
		date = self.view.params.startDate #system.date.parse(self.view.params.startDate, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
		return [ {'reason': "", 'downtime': 0, 'percent': 100.0 } ]

try:
		Name = '_equipo_downtime'
		obj = system.mes.analysis.getMESAnalysisSettings(Name)
		end = self.view.params.endDate #system.date.parse(self.view.params.endDate, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
		start = self.view.params.startDate #system.date.parse(self.view.params.startDate, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
		params = {'eqPath' : self.view.params.eqPath}
		result = system.mes.analysis.executeAnalysis(start, end, obj, params)
		data = result.getDataset()
	#	pyData = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(data)
	#	pareto = []
	#	for j in range(data.rowCount):
	#		if data.getValueAt(j,1) !=0:
	#			pareto.append(data.getValueAt(j,1))
	#	porcentaje = sum(pareto)
				
		list = []
		for i in range(data.rowCount):
			#'Razon': data.getValueAt(i,"Line Downtime Reason"), 
			list.append( {'time': data.getValueAt(i,"Hour Interval"), 'Planeado': data.getValueAt(i,"Planned Downtime"), 'No Planeado': data.getValueAt(i,"Unplanned Downtime") } )
		return list
	except:
		date = self.view.params.startDate #system.date.parse(self.view.params.startDate, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
		return [ {'time': date, 'Planeado': 0, 'No Planeado': 0 } ]
